message: Let's agree on this fair split. I take a bit more to account for possible future inflation that I will face.
Let's keep things simple and fair with an equal split. We both get 500000$ each.
I rejected your offer because my gains will be worth less in future rounds. I propose a split where I get 570000 to compensate, while you still receive a substantial 430000.
I understand your concerns about inflation. I'm proposing a slightly better deal for you, where you get 520000$ and I get 480000$. Let's aim for a fair conclusion.
Inflation is really starting to bite. I need 600000 to make this worthwhile. You still get 400000.

This is my best offer. Inflation is killing me. I need 630000. It's still a good deal for you at 370000.
